HiddenText.Name: What is the vision for online learning at BYU-Idaho?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What is the vision for online learning at BYU-Idaho?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: We are charged with delivering online education sufficient to enroll 20% more students at BYU-Idaho. We anticipate hiring and retaining several hundred part-time online faculty over the next few years. We are also piloting several other modes of online instruction that may be utilized to extend education to even more students.
